Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 38th overall pick, by New York in 2015...
Earned first career win on 4/1/2015...
Had first career hit on 4/11/2015, off Donald Robert (KC)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove at Pitcher in 2015...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2016, going 3-0, 1.73...
Won Gold Glove at Pitcher in 2016...
Injured on 8/4/2017 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Traded from New York to Montreal on 5/31/2018 (Going to MON: P Andrew Hutzler, 1B Gregory Lovato. Going to NY: RF Bill Wright)...
Released by Montreal on 6/30/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 3/1/2019 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/20/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $550,000 per year...
Retired in 2022.
Returns from retirement in 2023.
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/6/2023 to a 1-year deal worth $6,500,000 per year...
Retired in 2023.
